forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Thunder possible. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 46F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High near 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 23C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 76F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 12C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 54F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 22C. ESE winds shifting to SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 72F. ESE winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 64F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low near 50F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 9C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 49F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers late. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
